name: Reversi-python
tagline: Reversi game in python (ACA Semester project, IIT Kanpur,India)
body:
### Reversi Game using Python
![Reversi](https://github.com/yashsriv/Reversi-Python/blob/master/res/logo.png)

### ACA Semester Project
![ACA](https://github.com/yashsriv/Reversi-Python/blob/master/res/aca.png)  
This is a semester project under Association of Computing Activities, Indian Institute of Technology Kanpur.  
Project Mentor : **Saurav Shekhar**

### Project Milestones

* Two Player game on a single computer  

* Single Player vs. AI  

* Two Player network game using sockets  

### Authors and Contributors
Gautam Yakasiri  
Piyush Bansal  
Subhdeep Saha  
Yash Srivastav (@yashsriv)
